content: Philosophical remark: The FHIR uses Resource aggregate/document for most of operations and that's brings difficulties when you need operations on lower level (like change one element in resource) and upper level (do business transaction touching x resources). We definitely need Patch Operation (or as @Andrew Rudenko proposed Patch Resource) and something like Transaction Operation (where specific transaction is restricted/checked by some rules, has it's own uri, security rules etc)
you need to patch within an operation, I think you are saying
